name: Mystery Solitaire. Grimm's Tales 5
description:
The mystical and wonderful world of the Grimm fairy tales continues to immerse you in its unforgettable atmosphere. Help Little Red Riding Hood reach her grandmother's house and protect her from the evil gray wolf.

Collect the cards in chains and enjoy the atmosphere of a magical fairy-tale world! There are 200 levels of varying difficulty on which the gold cards are hidden. Use the auxiliary tools to collect them.

- Interesting levels that will get your brain working!
- Colorful graphics and theme music
- Use your magic wand in times of need!
- Increase the combo multiplier, which will give you more coins!
- 15 fabulous trophies
- Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
- Lots of hours of puzzles.
